tool_description: Configures GPS collar settings including sampling intervals, transmission schedules, and power management parameters for wildlife tracking deployments.

power_saving_mode.description: Enable power saving mode to extend battery life

error_messages: Invalid collar model: Provide a supported GPS collar model identifier.
Sampling interval out of range: Must be between 1-24 hours.
Transmission frequency out of range: Must be between 1-30 days.
Study duration out of range: Must be between 1-36 months.
Configuration incompatible: Selected settings may not support the required study duration.
usage: Specify collar_model, sampling_interval_hours, and study_duration_months. Optionally set transmission_frequency_days and power_saving_mode. Returns optimized collar configuration settings.

configuration_id.description: Unique identifier for the collar configuration

estimated_battery_life_months.description: Estimated battery life in months based on settings

total_expected_fixes.description: Expected number of GPS fixes over study duration
